abstract: The article concerns the issue of potential systemic, objective and subjective errors that could be possibly made by modern science, especially by the branch of computer science called artificial intelligence. The article warns against a very peculiar approach to simulation and to experimental certification of results in virtual cyberspace. The article emphasizes the importance of direct human communication and its development to insure that the future of society belongs to human society and the article also warns against the ongoing dehumanization and dumbification of man and society.
